headers.description: Additional HTTP headers to be used against OAI server with keys and string values

params.description: Additional query parameters with keys and string values

numberRetries.description: Number of retries for temporary errors before giving up (default 3)

waitRetries.description: Number of seconds to wait between retries (default 10)

set.description: OAI PMH set as returned in verb=ListSets

sourceId.description: Source identifier used for storing records

url.description: OAI PMH server prefix so that PREFIX?verb=.. works
